2022.title: Dell Project Frontier
2022.description: Dell Technologies introduces Project Frontier, which will deliver an edge operations software platform, integrated with Dellâ€™s edge portfolio, for customers to more securely manage and orchestrate edge applications and infrastructure for deployments at global scale.

2022.title: HPE Aruba Networking EdgeConnect Microbranch
2022.description: HPE Aruba Networking EdgeConnect Microbranch solution adds advanced SD-WAN and SASE capabilities to deliver a cloudmanaged, enterprise-grade solution for the home office or small office as part of a hybrid work environment.

2022.title: AKD1000 AI Chip
2022.description: BrainChip Achieves Full Commercialization of Akida AKD1000 Processor.

2022.title: Netskope Borderless WAN
2022.description: Netskope Borderless SD-WAN includes built-in routing, a transport-agnostic approach that supports both wired and wireless WAN networking (4G/5G), app-aware QoE enforcement combined with policy-based traffic steering, and integrated network security functions critical for deployment at the edge.

2022.title: First 5G Edge Developer Community
2022.description: Alef announced the launch of the first edge developer community aimed at making private wireless networking easy and affordable. The global community of 5,000 developers will collaborate to build mobility-based applications that address enterprise connectivity challenges.
